sense.def:
A pillar
je visoka, ozka in čvrsta konstrukcija, ki največkrat podpira del stavbe.

seg.quote: I fell asleep leaning against a pillar on someone's porch.

sense.def:
Človek, ki je
a pillar of a particular group
, je dejaven in pomemben član določene skupine.

seg.quote: I thought you had to be a pillar of the community to foster children.
